mapper.select:
SELECT S.AREAMAP, S.AREACODE, S.GRPCODE, S.GRPNAME, S.STRADDR, S.STRTEL, S.STROWNTEL, S.STRPOSLAT, S.STRPOSLON FROM (SELECT C.AREAMAP, A.AREACODE, B.GRPCODE, B.GRPNAME, A.STRCODE, STRNAME, STRADDR, STRTEL, STROWNTEL, STRPOSLAT, STRPOSLON FROM F_STORE A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_AREA_SKETCH_MAP_F C ON B.GRPCODE = C.GRPCODE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, A.GRPCODE) = 'YN042'
) S LEFT JOIN (SELECT STRCODE, SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) I ON S.STRCODE = I.STRCODE WHERE I.SNSRID = #{ snsrid } LIMIT 1

SELECT S.AREACODE , I.AREAMAP , I.SNSRID , MAX(L.OCALM + L.IGOALM + L.IGRALM) AS ALMCNT FROM (SELECT C.AREAMAP, B.STRCODE, A.SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_AREA_SKETCH_MAP_F C ON B.GRPCODE = C.GRPCODE WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, B.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND B.GRPCODE = #{grpcode} ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_LOG L ON I.SNSRID = L.SNSRID WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.AREACODE = #{areacode} GROUP BY S.AREACODE, I.SNSRID ORDER BY 3 DESC, I.SNSRID LIMIT 1

SELECT A.BACKUPYEAR, MIN(A.MINDATE) AS MINDATE, MAX(A.MAXDATE) AS MAXDATE FROM (SELECT '' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG UNION SELECT '_2022' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2022 UNION SELECT '_2021' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 UNION SELECT '_2020' AS BACKUPYEAR, DATE(MIN(REGDATE)) AS MINDATE, DATE(MAX(REGDATE)) AS MAXDATE FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 ) A WHERE #{regdt} BETWEEN A.MINDATE AND A.MAXDATE

SELECT A.AREANAME , COUNT(DISTINCT A.SNSRSEQ) AS SENSOR , COUNT(DISTINCT A.GRPCODE) AS STORE , COALESCE(SUM(A.DANGERSNSRCNT), 0) AS DANGER , COALESCE(SUM(A.WARNSNSRCNT), 0) AS WARN , COALESCE(SUM(A.DISNSNSRCNT), 0) AS DISCON FROM (SELECT A.AREANAME
, I.GRPCODE , I.SNSRSEQ , COALESCE(I.DANGERSNSRCNT, 0) AS DANGERSNSRCNT , COALESCE(I.WARNSNSRCNT, 0) AS WARNSNSRCNT , COALESCE(I.DISNSNSRCNT, 0) AS DISNSNSRCNT FROM (SELECT I1.GRPCODE , I1.STRCODE , I1.SNSRSEQ , (CASE WHEN I1.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DISNSNSRCNT , I2.DANGERSNSRCNT , I2.WARNSNSRCNT FROM (SELECT B.GRPCODE, A.STRCODE, SNSRSEQ, DATARCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_INFO A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, A.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) I1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRSEQ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN SNSRSEQ END) AS DANGERSNSRCNT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN SNSRSEQ END) AS WARNSNSRCNT FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE > CURDATE() AND OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM > 0 AND ISSIMUL = 0 GROUP BY SNSRSEQ) I2 ON I1.SNSRSEQ = I2.SNSRSEQ ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP SS ON S.STRCODE = SS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA A ON S.AREACODE = A.AREACODE WHERE S.AREACODE = #{ areaCode } ) A

SELECT A.AREACODE , S.GRPCODE , S.GRPNAME , COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT I.SNSRSEQ), 0) AS SNSRCOUNT , COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN I.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN I.SNSRSEQ END), 0) AS CON , COALESCE(SUM(I.DANGERCNT), 0) AS DANGER , COALESCE(SUM(I.WARNCNT), 0) AS WARN , COALESCE(SUM(I.DANGERSNSRCNT), 0) AS DANGERSNSRCNT , COALESCE(SUM(I.WARNSNSRCNT), 0) AS WARNSNSRCNT FROM (SELECT B.AREACODE, A.GRPCODE, B.STRCODE, GRPNAME FROM F_STORE_GROUP A LEFT JOIN F_STORE B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, B.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND B.AREACODE = #{ areaCode } ) S LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA A ON S.AREACODE = A.AREACODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT I1.STRCODE , I1.SNSRSEQ , I1.DATARCVTIME , I2.DANGERCNT , I2.WARNCNT , I2.DANGERSNSRCNT , I2.WARNSNSRCNT FROM (SELECT STRCODE, SNSRSEQ, DATARCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_INFO WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%') I1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRSEQ , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DANGERCNT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN SNSRSEQ END) AS DANGERSNSRCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WARNCNT , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN SNSRSEQ END) AS WARNSNSRCNT FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE > CURDATE() AND OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM > 0 AND ISSIMUL = 0 GROUP BY SNSRSEQ) I2 ON I1.SNSRSEQ = I2.SNSRSEQ GROUP BY I1.SNSRSEQ) I ON S.STRCODE = I.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(A.AREALEVEL, A.USEYN, A.DELYN, A.GUCODE) LIKE '1YN30%' GROUP BY S.GRPCODE ORDER BY DANGER DESC, WARN DESC, CON, GRPNAME

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS ROWNUM , SS.GRPCODE , SS.GRPNAME , I.SNSRID , TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM I.SNSRID) AS SNSRIDTRIM , I.SNSRNICK , (CASE WHEN I.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CON , COALESCE(L.DANGERCNT, 0) AS DANGER , COALESCE(L.WARNCNT, 0) AS WARN , COALESCE(E.CHK, 0) AS CHK , (CASE WHEN L.DANGERCNT > 0 THEN 'danger' WHEN L.WARNCNT > 0 THEN 'warn' WHEN I.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN 'discon' ELSE '' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT A.STRCODE, A.SNSRID, SNSRSEQ, SNSRNICK, DATARCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_INFO A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, A.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND B.GRPCODE = #{ grpCode } ) I LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRSEQ , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DANGERCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WARNCNT FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE > CURDATE() AND OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM > 0 AND ISSIMUL = 0 GROUP BY SNSRSEQ) L ON I.SNSRSEQ = L.SNSRSEQ LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP SS ON I.STRCODE = SS.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA A ON S.AREACODE = A.AREACODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRID, COUNT(*) AS CHK FROM F_SENSOR_CHECK WHERE CHECKSTAT = 'ING' GROUP BY SNSRID) E ON I.SNSRID = E.SNSRID WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(A.AREALEVEL, A.USEYN, A.DELYN, A.GUCODE) LIKE '1YN30%' AND A.AREACODE = #{ areaCode} GROUP BY I.SNSRID ORDER BY DANGER DESC, WARN DESC, CON DESC, SNSRID

SELECT S.AREACODE, L.AREANAME, S.STRCODE, S.STRNAME FROM (SELECT AREACODE, STRCODE, STRNAME FROM F_STORE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND STRNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ) S LEFT JOIN F_LEVEL_AREA L ON S.AREACODE = L.AREACODE WHERE CONCAT(L.AREALEVEL, L.USEYN, L.DELYN, L.GUCODE) LIKE '1YN30%' ORDER BY S.STRNAME

SELECT S.AREACODE , S.GRPCODE , S.GRPNAME , S.STRADDR , S.STRPOSLAT , S.STRPOSLON , S.AREAMAP , GROUP_CONCAT(B.SEQ ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS SEQ , GROUP_CONCAT(B.STRCODE ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS STRCODE , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGNAME ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGNAME , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGPATH ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGPATH , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGSIZE ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGSIZE , GROUP_CONCAT(B.IMGNUM ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS IMGNUM , GROUP_CONCAT(B.ORINAME ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS ORINAME , GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(B.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY B.SEQ) AS REGDATE FROM (SELECT C.AREAMAP, A.AREACODE, A.STRCODE, B.GRPCODE, B.GRPNAME, STRADDR, STRTEL, STROWNTEL, STRPOSLAT, STRPOSLON FROM F_STORE A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_AREA_SKETCH_MAP_F C ON B.GRPCODE = C.GRPCODE WHERE CONCAT(USEYN, DELYN, A.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND A.AREACODE = #{ areaCode } AND B.GRPCODE = #{ grpCode } ) S LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM F_AREA_IMG WHERE IMGLEVEL = 'store') B ON S.STRCODE = B.STRCODE

SELECT I.PANELNAME , I.SNSRID , I.SNSRNICK , S.STRPOSLAT , S.STRPOSLON , (CASE WHEN L.DANGERCNT > 0 THEN 'WARNING' WHEN L.WARNCNT > 0 THEN 'CAUTION' WHEN I.DATARCVTIME < NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR THEN 'DISCON' ELSE 'NORMAL' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT PANELNAME, B.GRPCODE, A.SNSRID, SNSRSEQ, SNSRNICK, DATARCVTIME, A.STRCODE FROM F_SENSOR_INFO A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, A.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND B.GRPCODE = #{ grpCode } ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRSEQ , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DANGERCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WARNCNT FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE > CURDATE() GROUP BY SNSRSEQ ) L ON I.SNSRSEQ = L.SNSRSEQ WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.AREACODE = #{ areaCode } ORDER BY 4 DESC, I.PANELNAME, I.SNSRNICK

SELECT
STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m'), '%Y-%m-%d') STR_TO_DATE(DATE(D.SNSRRCVTIME), '%Y-%m-%d') STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H'), '%Y-%m-%d %H') D.SNSRRCVTIME AS REGDT , AVG(D.SNSRKWH) AS KWH , AVG(D.SNSRWATT) AS WATT , AVG(D.SNSRVOLT) AS VOLT , AVG(D.SNSRAMPERE) AS AMPERE , AVG(D.SNSRHZ) AS HZ , AVG(D.SNSRPF) AS PF , AVG(D.SNSRIGO) AS IGO , AVG(D.SNSRIGR) AS IGR , AVG(D.SNSRIGC) AS IGC , AVG(D.SNSRREG) AS REG FROM (SELECT A.STRCODE, A.SNSRID FROM F_SENSOR_INFO A LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP B ON A.STRCODE = B.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(DELYN, A.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' AND B.GRPCODE = #{grpCode} AND A.SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) I LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRKWH, SNSRWATT, SNSRVOLT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRHZ, SNSRPF, SNSRIGO, SNSRIGR, SNSRIGC, SNSRREG FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME BETWEEN CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 00:00:00') AND
CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{regdt}), ' 23:59:59') CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') ) D ON I.SNSRID = D.SNSRID WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC DESC

SELECT DISTINCT I.SNSRID , DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDATE , D.SNSRKWH , D.SNSRVOLT , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRHZ , D.SNSRPF , D.SNSRREG , D.SNSRRSSI , D.SNSRIGR , D.SNSRIGO , D.SNSRIGC , L.OCALM , L.IGOALM , L.IGRALM , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(L.OCALM, L.IGOALM, L.IGRALM), '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(CONCAT(L.OCALM, L.IGOALM, L.IGRALM), '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE , (CASE WHEN OCALM > 0 THEN 'AMPERE' WHEN IGOALM > 0 THEN 'IGO' WHEN IGRALM > 0 THEN 'IGR' END) AS ALMTYPE , DATE_FORMAT(I.DATARCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS DATARCVTIME FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRKWH, SNSRVOLT, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRHZ, SNSRPF, SNSRREG, SNSRRSSI, SNSRIGR, SNSRIGO, SNSRIGC FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME
BETWEEN CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59')
> CURDATE()
AND SNSRID = #{snsrId}
) D LEFT JOIN
F_SENSOR_LOG_2022 F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 F_SENSOR_LOG L ON D.SNSRID = L.SNSRID AND D.SNSRRCVTIME = L.REGDATE LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE LEFT JOIN F_STORE_GROUP SS ON S.STRCODE = SS.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND S.AREACODE = #{areaCode} AND SS.GRPCODE = #{grpCode} AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC

SELECT A.SNSRID , DATE_FORMAT(A.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS DATARCVTIME , A.SNSRKWH , A.SNSRVOLT , A.SNSRWATT , A.SNSRAMPERE , A.SNSRHZ , A.SNSRPF , A.SNSRREG , A.SNSRRSSI , A.SNSRIGR , A.SNSRIGO , A.SNSRIGC , 0 AS USEKWH FROM (SELECT SNSRID , SNSRRCVTIME , SNSRKWH , SNSRVOLT , SNSRWATT , SNSRAMPERE , SNSRHZ , SNSRPF , SNSRREG , SNSRRSSI , SNSRIGR , SNSRIGO , SNSRIGC FROM (SELECT * FROM F_SENSOR_DATA UNION ALL SELECT * FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2021) D WHERE ISSIMUL = 0 AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ORDER BY SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT 1) A

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SNSRKWH) - MIN(SNSRKWH), 0) FROM (SELECT SNSRSEQ, SNSRKWH FROM
F_SENSOR_DATA_2022 F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 F_SENSOR_DATA
WHERE SNSRRCVTIME BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{regdt}, '%Y-%m'), '-01 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(LAST_DAY(#{regdt}), ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrId} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRSEQ = I.SNSRSEQ LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%'

SELECT A.CNT + B.CNT + C.CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) A , (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) B , (SELECT COUNT(D.SNSRRCVTIME) AS CNT FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ) B

(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2021 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(D.SNSRRCVTIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , D.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(D.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , D.SNSRWATT , D.SNSRAMPERE , D.SNSRIGO FROM (SELECT SNSRID, SNSRRCVTIME, SNSRWATT, SNSRAMPERE, SNSRIGO FROM F_SENSOR_DATA_2020 WHERE SNSRRCVTIME <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} ) D LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON D.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY D.SNSRRCVTIME DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit}) LIMIT #{pagestart}, 1000

(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2021 WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit})
UNION ALL
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(L.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS SNSRRCVTIME , L.SNSRID , SUBSTRING(L.SNSRID FROM 9 FOR 4) SNSRIDSUBSTR , L.LCAUSE , (CASE WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') > 0 THEN 'DANGER' WHEN INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '2') = 0 AND INSTR(L.ALMFLAG, '1') > 0 THEN 'WARN' END) AS STATE FROM (SELECT SNSRID, REGDATE, LCAUSE, CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM) AS ALMFLAG FROM F_SENSOR_LOG_2020 WHERE REGDATE <= CONCAT(#{regdt}, ' 23:59:59') AND SNSRID = #{snsrid} AND (OCALM + IGOALM + IGRALM) > 0 INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') > 0
(INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '2') = 0 AND INSTR(CONCAT(OCALM, IGOALM, IGRALM), '1') > 0)
) L LEFT JOIN F_SENSOR_INFO I ON L.SNSRID = I.SNSRID LEFT JOIN F_STORE S ON I.STRCODE = S.STRCODE WHERE CONCAT(S.USEYN, S.DELYN, S.GRPCODE) = 'YN042' AND CONCAT(I.DELYN, I.STRCODE) LIKE 'NFS_STR_%' ORDER BY L.REGDATE DESC LIMIT #{pagelimit}) LIMIT #{pagestart}, 1000
